document.full_text: a changing climate and a more settled lifestyle have removed any protection that canada's inuit people may once have had from diabetes, according to a report published on monday in the canadian medical association journal.
document.title: canadian inuit not immune to obesity risks - study
lines_and_colors: a changing climate and a more settled lifestyle have removed any protection that canada's inuit people may once have had from diabetes, according to a report published on monday in the canadian medical association journal.
